name: Ocean Viking
notes: Large NGO-operated rescue ship active in the central Mediterranean.

name: Humanity 1
notes: German-flagged ship carrying out humanitarian SAR missions off Libya and Italy.

name: Life Support
notes: Operates from Italian ports, used in central Mediterranean rescue operations.

name: Geo Barents
notes: MSF humanitarian rescue ship, temporarily paused operations in late 2024.

name: Sea-Watch 5
notes: German NGO rescue vessel replacing earlier Sea-Watch ships, active 2025.

name: ResQ People
notes: Operates in central Mediterranean; Italian NGO SAR missions from Sicily.

name: Mare Jonio
notes: Italian-flagged activist rescue vessel in the Mediterranean.

name: Louise Michel
notes: Small, fast pink rescue boat funded by artist Banksy, operates in central Med.

name: Nadir
notes: Small reconnaissance and support vessel used for spotting and assistance.

name: Sea-Eye 4
notes: Converted research vessel used by German NGO Sea-Eye for SAR operations.

name: Astral
notes: Used for rescues and awareness missions in the Western Med and Channel.

name: Open Arms Uno
notes: Large SAR ship operated by Spanish NGO Open Arms.
